charges.charge_disposition: 10 mos impr Count 1 superseding indictment, 5 mos custodial w/credit for time served, 5 mos served in Community Confinement w/work release; 2 Yrs Supervised Release w/deft to participate in drug abuse treatment under direction Probtion Officer, deft shall not possess firearm as defined in 18:921 and standard conditions, Court recommends deft be placed at federal facility in Brownsville, TX area; deft pay $50.00 Special Assessment due immediately, Fine is waived (1)
